error.already_exists: A camera with these URL settings already exists.
error.unable_still_load: Unable to load valid image from still image URL (e.g. invalid host, URL or authentication failure).  Review log for more info.
error.unable_still_load_auth: Unable to load valid image from still image URL: The camera may require a user name and password, or they are not correct.
error.unable_still_load_not_found: Unable to load valid image from still image URL: The URL was not found on the server.
error.unable_still_load_server_error: Unable to load valid image from still image URL: The camera replied with a server error.
error.unable_still_load_no_image: Unable to load valid image from still image URL: No image was returned.
error.no_still_image_or_stream_url: You must specify at least a still image or stream URL
error.invalid_still_image: URL did not return a valid still image
error.template_error: Error rendering template. Review log for more info.
error.stream_not_set_up: The stream integration is not set up. Please ensure that you have 'default_config:' or 'stream:' in your configuration.yaml
error.stream_no_route_to_host: Could not find host while trying to connect to stream
error.stream_io_error: Input/Output error while trying to connect to stream. Wrong RTSP transport protocol?
error.stream_not_permitted: Operation not permitted while trying to connect to stream. Wrong RTSP transport protocol?

user.description: Enter the settings to connect to the camera.

user_confirm.title: Confirmation
user_confirm.description: Please wait for previews to load...

data_description.use_wallclock_as_timestamps: This option may correct segmenting or crashing issues arising from buggy timestamp implementations on some cameras

user_confirm.title: Confirmation
user_confirm.description: Please wait for previews to load...
